alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:21PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD AND CENTRAL NEWBERRY COUNTIES... At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Blair, or 7 miles northeast of Newberry, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Newberry, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Blair, Newberry County Airport, Newberry County Detention Center, Maybington Fire Station, US- 176 and SC- 34 Crossroads, Feasterville Fire Station, Bush River Fire Station, Henderson Island, Belfast Wildlife Management Area and Enoree Ranger District Office. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 65 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
